DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study provide physician quality long term follow data subject Breast Cancer Clinic Plastic Surgery Clinic newly diagnose breast cancer receive treatment cancer facility . Over last two decade many study do concern quality life mastectomy and/or reconstruction process . The majority study run one year post reconstruction , however , include two year follow . The investigator propose 5 year long term follow study subject diagnose treat Breast Cancer Clinic Plastic Surgery Clinic . The investigator first questionnaire give prior treatment breast cancer , give u baseline subject 's current quality life . At successive year , subject give another questionnaire regard progression reconstructive process . At end 5 year , subject complete final questionnaire . These questionnaire deal many area daily life function ; activity daily live , anxiety , depression , social interaction , personal sexual relationship .
DOC.brief_title: A 5 Year Follow-up Newly Diagnosed Breast Cancer Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Upon inform consent subject , baseline questionnaire complete subject . At year 1 , 2 , 3 , 4 follow questionnaire send completion subject . At year 5 final questionnaire send subject completion.After subject complete study , data send Department Biostatics analysis .
DOC.criteria: Any female age 18 diagnose breast cancer treat follow Breast Cancer Clinic Plastic Surgery Clinic eligible study participation . Any person meeting requirement eligible study participation .
